featured.text: Steve’s description of the place was so _____ that I could almost picture it in my mind.
Steve has several meetings to attend every day; therefore, he has to work on a very _____ schedule.

definition.zh_def: 史蒂夫，一個常見的男性名字。
definition.en_def: Steve, a common male given name.
definition.example: Steve is planning to visit his friends this weekend.
